<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

<div>
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Supplier
shall be no less favorable than the sick-leave benefits generally available to
similarly situated Supplier employees. Supplier shall recognize vacations plans
made by the Transitioned Employees and approved by Altria, Kraft or another
Eligible Recipient prior to his or her Employment Effective Date, that in each
case were approved by Kraft prior to his or her Employment Effective Date
(which Kraft will verify upon Supplier&#146;s request), and shall permit such
Transitioned Employees to incur negative leave balances for this purpose so
long as such balances will be earned during the current calendar year or other
vacation plan period as may be required by applicable law.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Pension
Plans</b>. Each Transitioned Employee shall be eligible as of his or her Employment
Effective Date to participate immediately in Supplier&#146;s applicable defined
benefit or defined contribution pension plan .</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Savings
Plans</b>. Each Transitioned Employee shall be eligible as of his or her
Employment Effective Date to participate immediately in Supplier&#146;s applicable
savings plan .</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Flexible
Spending Account Plans</b>. Each Transitioned Employee shall be eligible as of
his or her Employment Effective Date to participate in Supplier&#146;s applicable
health care and dependent care reimbursement accounts .</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Tuition
Assistance</b>. Transitioned Employees shall be eligible to participate in all
tuition assistance programs provided by Supplier to its similarly situated
employees. Courses which are in progress as of the enrolled Transitioned
Employee&#146;s Employment Effective Date, for which tuition assistance has been
approved by Kraft, and Courses which have been approved and paid for by the
Transitioned Employee prior to the Transitioned Employees Employment Effective
Date (which Kraft shall confirm at Supplier&#146;s request), shall be reimbursed by
Supplier at the completion of the Course, provided all of the requisites for
reimbursement under the Transitioned Employee&#146;s existing program have been
approved. &#147;<b>Course</b>&#148; refers to specific classes
in progress or scheduled to start during a particular term and does not refer
to a degree program.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bonus
Programs</b>. Supplier shall provide to the Transitioned Employees the same
variable compensation, incentive compensation, and bonus programs as are available
to similarly situated Supplier employees.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.9</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Severance Pay
Plans</b>. Supplier&#146;s employment offer to each Affected Kraft Foods Global
Personnel will state that if the Affected Kraft Foods Global Personnel accepts
the employment offer and is subsequently terminated by Supplier within the
first *&#160; *&#160; * of employment with Supplier for any reason
other than Cause, the Affected Kraft Foods Global Personnel (other than
Affected Kraft Foods Global Personnel outside of Canada who received severance
from Kraft or another Eligible Recipient at the time they became Transitioned
Employees) will be paid a lump sum payment in lieu of any other separation or
severance payment in an amount equal to (1) the greater of (A) the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> under the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
as of the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> with Kraft or the Eligible
Recipient (other than Altria), as applicable, or (B) the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
under <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> then current severance plan, <i>plus</i> (2) an additional amount to cover such employee&#146;s <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> (including a <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>) of obtaining <b>*&#160; *&#160; * </b>coverage for a time period equal
to what would have been <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
had the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> in clause (1) above been <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>. The Affected Kraft Foods Global
Personnel outside of Canada who received severance from Kraft at the time they
became Transitioned Employees, and the Affected Tech Center Personnel shall
only be entitled to the severance payment calculated under Supplier&#146;s then
current severance plan. Supplier shall be entitled to reduce its
severance payment to each Affected Kraft Foods Global Personnel in Canada, by
the severance payment amount paid by Kraft to such personnel at the time such
personnel was severed by Kraft, to the extent such reduction is permitted by
applicable Law. After such 24 month period, all Transitioned </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">43</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Employees
shall only be entitled to the severance payment calculated under Supplier&#146;s
then-current severance plan. Payment of any such amount shall be contingent
upon the Transitioned Employee signing a separation agreement deemed
appropriate and used non-discriminatorily by Supplier (which will include,
amongst its other terms, a release and/or waiver of any claims the Transitioned
Employee may have against Supplier).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.10</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Benefits
Information Outside the U.S. </b>At the request of Supplier and within a
reasonable time frame, Kraft, Altria or another applicable Eligible Recipient
will deliver or make available the information set forth below.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.2.10.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>UK-Specific Information. </b>In the United Kingdom, copies of
such information as is required to initiate and complete the transfer of
employment per the EU Acquired Rights Directive and all tax, PAYE, social
security and national insurance records and copies of any other agreed-upon
documents or records that are relevant to the Affected Kraft Foods Global
Personnel or Affected Tech Center Personnel, if any, and any employees who
transfer pursuant to the EU Acquired Rights Directive or similar applicable
Laws, including, without limitation, those referred to in Regulation 55(2)
Income Tax (Employment) Regulations 1993 and paragraph 32(1) schedule 1 Social
Security (Contribution) Regulations 1979).</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.2.10.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Other Countries. </b>In countries other than the United States
and the United Kingdom, such information as is required to initiate and
complete the transfer of employment per the EU Acquired Rights Directive or similar
applicable Laws; provided that:</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 144.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.2.10.2.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Kraft
shall, or shall arrange for Altria or an Eligible Recipient to, preserve the
originals of such records or documents for a period of at least five years (or
such shorter or longer period as may be required by any relevant laws) after
the Commencement Date and shall allow Supplier access to the same at all
reasonable times to the extent necessary to enable Supplier to deal with any
matters relating to the Affected Personnel, and any employees who transfer
pursuant to the EU Acquired Rights Directive or similar applicable Laws, and
shall, as and when requested by Supplier to do so, produce the same to the
relevant authorities.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 144.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.2.10.2.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Should
Kraft, Altria or an Eligible Recipient wish to dispose of or destroy any such
records or documents prior to the expiration of three years after the
Commencement Date, it shall not do so without informing Supplier of its
intention to do so and if Supplier so requests, it shall deliver to Supplier
such of the records or documents as Supplier may request.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.11</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>EU Benefits
Liabilities. </b>All wages, salaries and entitlement to other benefits for
Transitioned Employees in the EU (except as otherwise provided in this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8.2.12</u></b>), and all the
employer&#146;s liabilities for Transitioned Employees in the EU in respect of PAYE,
tax deductions, social security payments and national insurance contributions
relating thereto and arising on or after the Employment Effective Date shall be
discharged by the Supplier during employment with the Supplier or its
Subcontractors or Affiliates. In addition, except where otherwise required by
applicable Laws, Kraft shall retain responsibility for administering and paying
the pension benefits that were earned at Kraft or its Affiliates by the Transitioned
Employees immediately </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">44</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='44',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">prior
to their Employment Effective Date. Kraft, Altria or the applicable Eligible
Recipient shall be and remain liable for the payment of all such amounts
accrued up to the Employment Effective Date.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2.12</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Non-EU
Benefits Liabilities. </b>All wages, salaries and entitlement to other benefits
for Transitioned Employees in non-EU countries, and all the employer&#146;s
liabilities for Transitioned Employees in non-EU countries relating thereto and
arising on or after the Employment Effective Date shall be discharged by the
Supplier, during employment with the Supplier or its Subcontractors or
Affiliates. Kraft, Altria or the applicable Eligible Recipient shall be and
remain liable for the payment of all such amounts accrued up to the Employment
Effective Date.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Other
Employee Matters.</b><a name="a8_3OtherEmployeeMatters__133139"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.3.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Responsibility
for Transitioned Employees</b>. As of the Employment Effective Date, the
Transitioned Employees shall be employees of Supplier for all purposes.
Supplier shall be responsible for all necessary recruiting and hiring costs
associated with employing appropriate staff. In addition, Supplier shall be
responsible for funding and distributing benefits under the benefit plans in
which Transitioned Employees participate on or after the Transitioned Employee&#146;s
Employment Effective Date and for paying any compensation and remitting any
income, disability, withholding and other employment taxes for such
Transitioned Employees beginning on the Employment Effective Date. Unless
otherwise agreed, Altria, Kraft or the other applicable Eligible Recipient
shall be responsible for funding and distributing benefits under the Kraft
benefit plans in which Transitioned Employees participated prior to the
Employment Effective Date and for paying any compensation and remitting any
income, disability, withholding and other employment taxes for such
Transitioned Employees for the period prior to the Employment Effective Date of
such Transitioned Employee. Altria, Kraft or another applicable Eligible
Recipient shall provide Supplier with such information in Kraft&#146;s possession
reasonably requested by Supplier in order to fulfill its obligations under this
<b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Article 8</u></b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.3.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Principles
for Other Countries</b>. The principles, rights, responsibilities and
obligations articulated in this <font style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u>Article 8</u></b></font> with respect to
the hiring of the Affected Personnel in the United States (<font style="font-weight:bold;"><b style="font-weight:normal;">&#147;</b>Principles</font><font style="font-weight:bold;"><b style="font-weight:normal;">&#148;</b></font>) shall be applicable to Affected
Personnel in countries other than the United States to the extent that the
applicable Laws of such countries are not inconsistent with the Principles. To
the extent the applicable Laws of any country are inconsistent with any of the
Principles, the Parties shall, with regard to such Principles as they apply to
Supplier Personnel in such country, restate such Principles to reflect as
nearly as possible the original intentions of the Parties regarding such
Principles in accordance with applicable Law. In any event, Supplier
performance of its obligations under this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8.3.2</u></b>
must both (i) comply with applicable Laws in each country, and (ii) comply with
the Principles, as a minimum, except where applicable Law requires otherwise,
all at no additional cost to Kraft</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 35.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-35.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.3.3</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Hiring of
Supplier Personnel at Expiration</b>. If, at the expiration of the Term,
Kraft is required to hire any Supplier Personnel as a result of the EU Acquired
Rights Directive or similar applicable Laws,<b> *&#160; *&#160; *</b>
will reimburse <b>*&#160;
*&#160; *</b> for any <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> made by <b>*&#160; *&#160; * </b>to
(i) any such Supplier Personnel where Kraft or its Affiliates are assuming
responsibility for the Services being performed by or on behalf of Supplier
prior to the expiration of the Term, or (ii) any such Supplier Personnel
performing Services from a location other than a Kraft Facility where Kraft is
transferring responsibility for those Services to a third party that is not a
Kraft Affiliate; provided in each case that Kraft, its Affiliates, or such
third party, as the case may be, severs such Supplier Personnel within a
reasonable period of time after such entity assumes responsibility for the
Services.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">45</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Key
Supplier Personnel and Critical Affected Personnel.</b><a name="a8_4KeySupplierPersonnelAndCritic_133146"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.4.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Approval
of Key Supplier Personnel.</b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.4.1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Before
assigning an individual to act as one of the Key Supplier Personnel whether as
an initial assignment or a subsequent assignment, Supplier shall notify Kraft
of the proposed assignment at least 40 business days prior to the planned
assignment, shall introduce the individual to appropriate Kraft
representatives, shall provide reasonable opportunity for Kraft representatives
to interview the individual, and shall provide Kraft with a resume, a plan
describing the steps and education that will be performed regarding the
turnover of responsibility to the proposed individual, and such other
information about the individual as may be reasonably requested by Kraft. If
Kraft in good faith objects to the proposed assignment, the Parties shall
attempt to resolve Kraft&#146;s concerns on a mutually agreeable basis. If the
Parties have not been able to resolve Kraft&#146;s concerns within five business
days of Kraft communicating its concerns, Supplier shall not assign the
individual to that position and shall propose to Kraft the assignment of
another individual of suitable ability and qualifications.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.4.1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Prior
to the Commencement Date, Supplier shall identify and obtain Kraft&#146;s approval
of all Supplier Personnel who will serve as Key Supplier Personnel. The
positions designated by Kraft as being Key Supplier Personnel positions and the
individuals that have been selected and approved for such positions as of the
Effective Date are listed in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 5.4</u></b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.4.1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Kraft
may from time to time change the positions designated as Key Supplier Personnel
under this Agreement with Supplier&#146;s approval which shall not be unreasonably
withheld.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.4.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Continuity of
Key Supplier Personnel</b>. For so long as the Key Supplier Personnel remains
employed by Supplier, Supplier shall cause each of the Key Supplier Personnel
to devote full time and effort to the provision of Services under this
Agreement for a minimum of <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
from the date he or she assumes the position in question (provided that, in the
case of Key Supplier Personnel assigned prior to any Commencement Date, the
minimum period shall be<b> *&#160; *&#160; *</b>
from the Commencement Date), to the extent permissible under applicable Laws.
Supplier shall not transfer, or reassign any of the Key Supplier Personnel
(except as a result of cause, or illness) or announce its intention to do so
during the specified period without Kraft&#146;s prior approval, which Kraft may
withhold in its sole discretion, except in the case of personal hardship, in
which case Kraft will not unreasonably withhold its approval. In addition, even
after the specified period, Supplier shall transfer, or reassign one of its Key
Supplier Personnel only after (i) giving Kraft at least 40 business days prior
notice of such action, (ii) identifying and obtaining Kraft&#146;s approval of a
suitable replacement at least 30 days prior to such transfer, reassignment or
removal and (iii) demonstrating to Kraft&#146;s reasonable satisfaction that such
action will not have an adverse impact on Supplier&#146;s performance of its
obligations under this Agreement. If Kraft in good faith objects to the
proposed transfer, or reassignment, the Parties shall attempt to resolve Kraft&#146;s
concerns on a mutually agreeable basis. If the Parties have not been able to
resolve Kraft&#146;s concerns within five business days of Kraft communicating its
concerns, Supplier shall not transfer, or reassign the individual from that
position. Unless otherwise agreed, *&#160;
*&#160; * shall <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
than <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> of the Key Supplier Personnel in
any <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> . In the event of the voluntary
resignation or termination of one of its Key Supplier Personnel during or after
the specified period, Supplier shall (i) give Kraft as much notice as
reasonably possible of such development, and (ii) expeditiously identify and
obtain Kraft&#146;s approval of a suitable replacement.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">46</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.4.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Engagement
of Contractors and Continuity of Critical Affected Personnel</b>. Supplier will
take an assignment of Kraft contracts specified in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule
12.1 </u></b>for the Critical Affected Personnel who are contractors, or
enter into replacements with such contractors. Subject to Supplier&#146;s employment policies, Supplier will not (i) transfer
or reassign any Critical Affected Personnel who are Transitioned Employees
during the <b>*&#160;
*&#160; *</b> after his or her
Employment Effective Date, or (ii) transfer, reassign or discontinue the
contract for Critical Affected Personnel who are contractors except for Cause
during the <b>*&#160;
*&#160; *</b> after the
Commencement Date (or, in the case of contractors in Deferred Countries, <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> after the date Supplier begins
providing Services from such country), in each case without Kraft&#146;s approval.
In addition, in the event Supplier intends to terminate any Critical Affected
Personnel who are Transitioned Employees during the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
following the applicable Employment Effective Date, for any reason except
Cause, Supplier will (A) provide timely notice to Kraft of its intent to
terminate any of such Critical Affected Personnel in accordance with this
Section, (B) take reasonable measures to ensure and demonstrate to Kraft&#146;s
reasonable satisfaction that there will be adequate transfer of knowledge
between such Critical Affected Personnel and Supplier, and (C) give due
consideration to Kraft&#146;s concerns with respect to the impact of terminating
such Critical Affected Personnel prior to so terminating any such person.
Further, in the event Supplier wishes to terminate the contract for Critical
Affected Personnel who are contractors anytime between the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
after Supplier first engaged such contractors as provided above, for any reason
except Cause, Supplier will (1) provide timely notice to Kraft of its intent to
terminate the contract for contractors, (2) take reasonable measures to ensure
and demonstrate to Kraft&#146;s reasonable satisfaction that there will be adequate
transfer of knowledge between such contractors and Supplier, and (3) give due
consideration to Kraft&#146;s concerns with respect to the impact of terminating
such contractors prior to such <b>* * *</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.4.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Retention
and Succession</b>. Supplier shall implement and maintain a retention strategy
designed to retain Key Supplier Personnel and Critical Affected Personnel (but
only if reasonably necessary in the case of contractors) on the Kraft account
for the prescribed period. Supplier shall also maintain active succession plans
for each of the Key Supplier Personnel positions. Supplier shall implement
various retention strategies to retain Key Supplier Personnel and Critical
Affected Personnel, which, except for contractors, may include granting stock
options, awards, salary increases, recognition events and other retention and
incentive programs offered to similarly situated Supplier employees. Upon
separation of any Key Supplier Personnel, Supplier shall provide notice to
Kraft of such separation and identify potential suitable replacements.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Supplier
Account Executive.</b><a name="a8_5SupplierAccountExecutive__133154"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Supplier shall designate a Supplier Account Executive
for the Services who, unless otherwise agreed by Kraft, shall maintain his or
her office at Three Lakes Drive, Northfield, Illinois 60093. The Supplier
Account Executive shall (i) be one of the Key Supplier Personnel; (ii) be a
full time employee of Supplier; (iii) devote his or her full time and effort to
managing the Services; (iv) not be transferred, or reassigned for <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> from the initial assignment
(except as required by law or as a result of illness or disability); (v) serve
as the single point of accountability for the Services; (vi) be the single
point of contact to whom all Kraft communications concerning this Agreement may
be addressed; (vii) have authority to act on behalf of Supplier in all
day-to-day matters pertaining to this Agreement; and (viii) have day-to-day
authority for ensuring customer satisfaction and attainment of all Service
Levels.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>*&#160; *&#160; *
Supplier Account Executive and Key Supplier Personnel.</b><a name="a8_6SupplierAccountExecutiveAndKe_133202"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.6.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Supplier
Account Executive</b>. At a minimum, <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of the Supplier Account Executive&#146;s <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>,
to the extent such <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
is generally available to such employee in accordance with <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
program, shall be based upon (i) the level of <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
reflected in the periodic <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>;
(ii) the </p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">extent
to which <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> has <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>, <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
and <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> other <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
under <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>; (iii) <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> relating to <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
and its <b>*&#160; *&#160; * </b>in <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>,
as reasonably determined by <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
and (iv) <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> determination as to whether <b>*&#160; *&#160; * </b>has <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> set by the *&#160; *&#160; * or
his or her designee.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.6.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Key
Supplier Personnel</b>. At a minimum, <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of the&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>,
to the extent such <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
is generally available to such employee in accordance with <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>,
of the Key Supplier Personnel listed on <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 5.4</u></b>
shall be based upon the factors set forth in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section
8.6(a)</u></b> above.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.6.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Evaluation
Input</b>. Kraft shall have a meaningful opportunity to provide information to
Supplier with respect to Kraft&#146;s evaluation of the performance of the Supplier
Account Executive and the other Key Supplier Personnel and such evaluation
shall be considered and accorded substantial weight by Supplier in establishing
the <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> and <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of such individuals.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Supplier
Personnel Are Not Kraft Employees.</b><a name="a8_7SupplierPersonnelAreNotKraftE_133227"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as otherwise expressly set forth in this
Agreement, the Parties intend to create an independent contractor relationship
and nothing in this Agreement shall operate or be construed as making Kraft (or
Altria or any Eligible Recipients) and Supplier partners, joint venturers,
principals, joint employers, agents or employees of or with the other. No
officer, director, employee, agent, Affiliate, contractor or subcontractor
retained by Supplier to perform work hereunder shall be deemed to be an
officer, director, employee, agent, Affiliate, contractor or subcontractor of
Altria, Kraft or the Eligible Recipients for any purpose. Supplier, not Altria,
Kraft or the Eligible Recipients, has the right, power, authority and duty to
supervise and direct the activities of the Supplier Personnel, to compensate
such Supplier Personnel for any work performed by them on the behalf of Altria,
Kraft or the Eligible Recipients pursuant to this Agreement, and to terminate
Supplier&#146;s employment of such personnel. Supplier, and not Altria, Kraft or the
Eligible Recipients, shall be responsible and therefore solely liable for all
acts and omissions of Supplier Personnel acting in the course of their
employment, including acts or omissions constituting negligence, gross
negligence, willful misconduct and/or fraud.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Replacement,
Qualifications and Retention of Supplier Personnel.</b><a name="a8_8ReplacementQualificationsAndR_133238"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.8.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Sufficiency
and Suitability of Personnel</b>. Supplier shall assign (or cause to be
assigned) sufficient Supplier Personnel to provide the Services in accordance
with this Agreement and such Supplier Personnel shall possess suitable
competence, ability and qualifications and shall be properly educated and
trained for the Services they are to perform.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.8.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Requested
Replacement</b>. In the event that Kraft determines lawfully and in good faith
that the continued assignment to Kraft of any individual Supplier Personnel
(including Key Supplier Personnel) is not in the best interests of Kraft or the
Eligible Recipients, then Kraft shall give Supplier notice to that effect
requesting that such Supplier Personnel be replaced. Supplier shall have 10
business days following Kraft&#146;s request for removal of such Supplier Personnel
in which to investigate the matters forming the basis of such request, correct
any deficient performance and provide Kraft with assurances that such deficient
performance shall not recur (provided that, if requested to do so, Supplier
shall immediately remove (or cause to be removed) the individual in question
from all Kraft sites pending completion of Supplier&#146;s investigation and
discussions with Kraft). If, following such 10 business day period, Kraft is
not reasonably satisfied with the results of Supplier&#146;s efforts to correct the
deficient performance and/or to ensure its non-recurrence, Supplier shall, as
soon as possible, remove and replace such Supplier Personnel with an individual
of suitable ability and qualifications, without cost to Kraft. Nothing in this
provision shall operate or be construed to limit Supplier&#146;s responsibility for
the acts or omission of the Supplier Personnel, or be construed as joint
employment.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">48</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='48',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.8.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Turnover
Rate and Data</b>. Supplier will use commercially reasonable efforts to keep
the turnover rate of personnel performing the Services to a level comparable or
better than averages for large, well-managed first tier service providers
performing similar services, and in any case as necessary to comply with the
applicable Service Levels. If Kraft determines that the turnover rate of
Supplier Personnel is higher than that noted above or otherwise has an adverse
effect on Kraft, and so notifies Supplier, Supplier shall within 30 days (i)
provide Kraft with data concerning Supplier&#146;s turnover rate, (ii) meet with
Kraft to discuss the reasons for the turnover rate, and (iii) submit a proposal
for reducing the turnover rate for Kraft&#146;s review and approval. Notwithstanding
any transfer or turnover of Supplier Personnel, Supplier shall remain obligated
to perform the Services without degradation and in accordance with the Service
Levels.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.8.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Restrictions
on Performing Services to Competitors</b>. Neither Supplier nor any
Subcontractor shall cause or permit any dedicated, client-facing Transitioned
Personnel; Transitioned Personnel who are SAP basis programmers or database
administrators; Critical Affected Personnel, other than contractors; or Key Supplier
Personnel (who remain employed by Supplier or a Subcontractor) to perform
services directly or indirectly for or market Supplier&#146;s services to a Direct
Kraft Competitor either while engaged in the provision of Services or during
the first *&#160; *&#160; * after the Effective Date for the
Transitioned Employees and, with respect to: (a) each Key Supplier Personnel,
for a period of *&#160; *&#160; * immediately following the termination of his
or her involvement in the provision of such Services without Kraft&#146;s prior written
consent, and (b) each Critical Affected Personnel (who is not a Key Supplier
Personnel and not a contractor), for a period of *&#160; *&#160; *
immediately following the termination of his or her involvement in the
provision of such Services without Kraft&#146;s prior written consent.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.8.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Supplier
Personnel</b>. Supplier shall comply with applicable Laws with respect to
verifying the authorization of Supplier Personnel to work in any country in
which they are assigned to perform Services. To the extent allowed by applicable
laws and to the extent of consistency with market practice, for newly-hired
Supplier employees (which does not include Transitioned Employees), Supplier
shall perform or have performed a background check, drug test and credit test
on all Supplier Personnel assigned to work hereunder, provided that, if a
satisfactory background check was completed in connection with the hiring of
such Supplier Personnel, it need not be repeated. Supplier Personnel who do not
meet Supplier&#146;s hiring criteria shall not be assigned to work hereunder.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.9</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Conduct
of Supplier Personnel.</b><a name="a8_9ConductOfSupplierPersonnel__133248"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.9.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Conduct
and Compliance</b>. While at Kraft Sites or Kraft Facilities, Supplier
Personnel shall (i) comply with the Kraft Rules and other rules and regulations
regarding personal and professional conduct, including Kraft Labor Policies listed in <b>Schedule
17.5</b>, generally applicable to personnel at such Kraft Sites
(and communicated to Supplier in writing or by any other means generally used
by Kraft to disseminate such information to its employees or contractors), (ii)
comply with reasonable requests of Kraft or the Eligible Recipients personnel
pertaining to personal and professional conduct, (iii) attend workplace
training offered by Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients at Kraft&#146;s request, and
(iv) otherwise conduct themselves in a businesslike and professional manner.
Provided Supplier has received reasonable notice from Kraft, Supplier shall
ensure that any Supplier Personnel who provide Services at the applicable Kraft
Site shall have passed background screening and drug testing to the extent such
screening or testing is generally required of third party service providers
performing work in such Kraft Sites for comparable periods of time, provided
such requirement is permitted by applicable Law.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.9.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Identification
of Supplier Personnel</b>. All Supplier Personnel shall clearly identify
themselves as Supplier Personnel and not as employees of Kraft and/or the
Eligible Recipients. This shall </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">49</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='49',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">include
any and all communications, whether oral, written or electronic. Each Supplier
Personnel shall wear a badge indicating that he or she is employed by Supplier
or its Subcontractors when at a Kraft Site or Facility. Supplier personnel will
be required to display a Kraft badge while at a Kraft Facility or Kraft Site,
such badge will be clearly marked with the words &#147;Contractor,&#148; on the front of
the badge in an offsetting color to the badge background, to indicate that the
Supplier personnel are not employees of Kraft or an Eligible Recipient.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.9.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Restriction
on Marketing Activity</b>. Except for marketing representatives designated in
writing by Supplier to Kraft, none of the Supplier Personnel shall conduct any
marketing activities to Kraft or Eligible Recipient employees at Kraft
Facilities or sites (including marketing of any New Services), other than,
subject to <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 13.3</u></b>, reporting
potential marketing opportunities to Supplier&#146;s designated marketing
representatives.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.10</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Substance
Abuse.</b><a name="a8_10SubstanceAbuse__133259"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.10.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Employee
Removal</b>. To the extent permitted by applicable Laws, Supplier shall
immediately remove (or cause to be removed) any Supplier Personnel who is known
to be or reasonably suspected of engaging in substance abuse while at Kraft
Facility or Site, in a Kraft vehicle or while performing Services. In the case
of reasonable suspicion, such removal shall be pending completion of the
applicable investigation. Substance abuse includes the sale, attempted sale,
possession or use of illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia, or, to the extent not
permitted on at Kraft Facilities or Kraft Sites, alcohol, or the misuse of
prescription or non-prescription drugs.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.10.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Substance
Abuse Policy</b>. Supplier represents and warrants that it has and will
maintain substance abuse policies, in each case in conformance with applicable
Laws, and Supplier Personnel will be subject to such policies. Supplier
represents and warrants that it shall require its Subcontractors (other than
Commodity Equipment and Transport Providers, product vendor specialists who
Supplier engages on a temporary basis to address urgent problems, and Third
Party Contractors under Third Party Contracts assumed by Supplier to the extent
such contracts do not comply with this requirement as of the Effective Date)
and Affiliates providing Services to have and maintain such policy in
conformance with applicable Law and to adhere to this provision.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.11</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Union
Agreements and WARN ACT.</b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.11.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notice
by Supplier</b>. Supplier shall provide Kraft not less than 90 days notice of
the expiration of any collective agreement with unionized Supplier Personnel if
the expiration of such agreement or any resulting labor dispute could
potentially interfere with or disrupt the business or operations of Kraft or an
Eligible Recipient or impact Supplier&#146;s ability to timely perform its duties
and obligations under this Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.11.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>WARN
Act Commitment</b>. Supplier shall not, for a period of 90 days after the
Commencement Date, cause any of the Transitioned Employees who were located at
Kraft&#146;s Bannockburn facility prior to their Employment Effective Date to suffer
&#147;employment loss&#148; as that term is construed under the Worker Adjustment and
Retraining Notification Act (&#147;<b>WARN Act</b>&#148;), if
such employment loss could create any liability for Altria, Kraft, the Eligible
Recipients, or any of their respective Affiliates, under the WARN Act with
respect to Kraft&#146;s Bannockburn facility, unless Supplier delivers notices under
the WARN Act in a manner and at a time such that Altria, Kraft, the Eligible
Recipients or their respective Affiliates bear no liability with respect
thereto.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.11.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Responsibility</b>.
Supplier shall be responsible for any liability, cost, claim, expense,
obligation or sanction attributable to any breach by Supplier of <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8.11.2</u></b> that results in
Altria, Kraft or the </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">50</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='50',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Eligible
Recipients being in violation of the WARN Act or the regulations promulgated
thereunder with respect to Kraft&#146;s Bannockburn facility.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.12</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Application
of Acquired Rights Directive and Similar Laws. </b>Each Party agrees to comply
fully with its legal <a name="a8_12_133324"></a>obligations under the EU
Acquired Rights Directive and similar applicable Laws if and where applicable
to the transfer of Affected Personnel to Supplier&#146;s or Supplier&#146;s Affiliate&#146;s
employment, including (without limitation) its obligations regarding
consultation and the giving of information.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.13</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Altria
Affiliates. </b>For purposes of this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Article 8</u></b>,
references to Altria shall include its Affiliates.<a name="a8_13_133331"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.14</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Directed
Employees</b>. Kraft shall make available to Supplier for use in Supplier&#146;s
performance of Services the <a name="a8_14_133337"></a>employees of Kraft and
its Affiliates (including Altria) listed on <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule
26</u></b> (so long as they remain employees with Kraft or its
Affiliates (including Altria) and are not unavailable due to reasons beyond
Kraft&#146;s reasonable control) for the period commencing on the Commencement Date
and extending through the date specified for each such employee on <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 26</u></b> (such period with
respect to each such employee, the &#147;<b>Directed Employee Period</b>&#148;
and each such employee during such respective period, a &#147;<b>Directed
Employee</b>&#148;). Supplier shall provide direction to Kraft management
personnel who will instruct (or arrange for Altria to instruct) Directed
Employees to perform activities in connection with Supplier&#146;s performance of
the Services in a manner consistent with the technical direction provided by
Supplier. Supplier shall not have authority to fire, impose discipline or
otherwise to take personnel related actions with respect to the Directed
Employees. The Parties agree that no employer and employee relationship is to
be created between Supplier and the Directed Employees, and that no
co-employment relationship is created nor is intended to be created, and
further that no employee benefits available to employees of Supplier shall
accrue to the Directed Employees during the period such employees are employed
by Kraft or its Affiliates. Supplier will at all times exercise its right to
provide Kraft management with technical direction regarding the activities of
the Directed Employee in accordance with Kraft&#146;s or Altria&#146;s policies, and in
consultation, as necessary, with the Kraft Contract Manager or his/her
designee. In respect of the Directed Employees, Supplier shall not be
responsible for implementing and administering Kraft or Altria human resources
policies, practices or procedures, including without limitation those
addressing hiring, compensation, promotions, transfers, terminations,
employment related complaints, or general career development and performance
management. Deficient performance by any Directed Employee while performing a
function under Supplier&#146;s direction shall not constitute a failure by Kraft to
perform any of its obligations under this Agreement, and, except as provided in
the last sentence of this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8.14</u></b>,
shall not excuse Supplier from any of its obligations under this Agreement.
Other terms applicable to the Directed Employees shall otherwise be as provided
in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 26</u></b>. Supplier shall be
excused for a Directed Employee&#146;s failure to perform as directed by Supplier if
Supplier has notified Kraft in writing of such failure and Kraft has not
thereafter caused the Directed Employee to promptly correct such failure.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; SUPPLIER
RESPONSIBILITIES.</font></b><a name="a9_SupplierResponsibilities__133345"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Policy
and Procedures Manual.</b><a name="a9_1PolicyAndProceduresManual__133356"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.1.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Content</b>.
As part of the Services, and at no additional cost, Supplier shall provide to
Kraft and the Eligible Recipients a manual describing the policies and
procedures that will govern the provision of the Services, including the
content required by <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 21.1</u></b>
and those policies and </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">51</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='51',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">procedures
of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients that Kraft may designate from time to time
(the &#147;<b>Policy and Procedures Manual</b>&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.1.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Delivery</b>.
Supplier shall deliver the Policy and Procedures Manual to Kraft for its
review, comment and approval in accordance with the following deadlines:</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1.2.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Initial Outline</b>. Supplier shall deliver a detailed outline
of the content to be included in the Policy and Procedures Manual within 30
days after the Effective Date.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1.2.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Content Required Prior to the Commencement Date</b>. Supplier
shall deliver the portions of the Policy and Procedures Manual that are
required to be completed prior to the Commencement Date (including content
identified as such in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 21.1</u></b>)
at least 30 days prior to the Commencement Date.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1.2.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Content Required Following the Commencement Date</b>. Supplier
shall deliver the complete Policy and Procedures Manual no later than 120 days
after the Commencement Date (or, in the case of Deferred Countries, within 30
days after Supplier assumes responsibility for providing Services in those countries,
if that date is later than the 120 days after the Commencement Date).</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1.2.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Kraft Review and Comments</b>. Supplier shall make any changes
reasonably requested by Kraft with respect to the Materials delivered pursuant
to this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.1.2</u></b> within 15
business days after receipt from Kraft, and shall resubmit such Materials for
Kraft&#146;s further review and approval.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.1.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Revision
and Maintenance. </b>Following approval of the complete Policy and Procedures
Manual, and to the extent not in conflict with the rights and responsibilities
set forth in this Agreement or the Schedules, Supplier shall incorporate any
additional comments or suggestions of Kraft into the Policy and Procedures
Manual and shall deliver a final revised version to Kraft for Kraft&#146;s approval
within 30 days of Supplier&#146;s receipt of such comments and suggestions. The
Policy and Procedures Manual will be delivered and maintained by Supplier in
hard copy and electronic formats and will be accessible electronically to Kraft
management and Authorized Users in a manner consistent with Kraft&#146;s security
policies.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.1.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Compliance</b>.
Subject to Supplier&#146;s responsibilities in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Sections 9.4</u></b>
and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">9.10.9</u></b>,<b><i style="font-weight:bold;"> </i></b>Supplier
shall keep its records related to this Agreement in accordance with GAAP, and
perform the Services in accordance with Kraft&#146;s requirements related to the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 as set forth in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u></b>
or <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 17.4</u></b>, or otherwise
provided in writing by Kraft, and any and all applicable Laws and Kraft&#146;s then
current policies and procedures until the Policy and Procedures Manual is
finalized and agreed upon by the Parties. Thereafter, Supplier shall perform
the Services in accordance with the Policy and Procedures Manual. In the event
of a conflict between the provisions of this Agreement and the Policy and
Procedures Manual, the provisions of this Agreement shall control unless the
Parties expressly agree otherwise and such agreement is set forth in the
relevant portion of the Policy and Procedures Manual. Without limiting Supplier&#146;s
obligations under this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.1.4</u></b>
and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Sections 9.4</u></b> and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">9.10.9</u></b>, Kraft acknowledges and
agrees that it retains responsibility for its compliance with GAAP and the
Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.1.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Modification
and Updating</b>. Supplier shall promptly modify and update the Policy and
Procedures Manual monthly to reflect changes in the operations or procedures
described therein and to comply with Kraft Standards, the Technology Plan and
Strategic Plans as described in </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">52</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='52',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Section 9.5</font></u></b>. Supplier shall
provide the proposed changes in the manual to Kraft for review, comment and
approval. To the extent such change could (i) increase Kraft&#146;s total costs of
receiving the Services; (ii) require material changes to the facilities,
systems, software or equipment of Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients; (iii)
have an adverse impact on the functionality, interoperability, performance,
accuracy, speed, responsiveness, quality or resource efficiency of the
Services, or (iv) violate or be inconsistent with the Kraft Standards, the Technology
Plan or Strategic Plans, Supplier shall not implement such change without first
obtaining Kraft&#146;s approval, which Kraft may withhold in its sole discretion.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.1.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Annual
Review</b>. The Parties shall meet to perform a formal annual review of the
Policy and Procedures Manual on each anniversary of the Commencement Date.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reports.</b><a name="a9_2Reports__133408"></a></p>
