<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.2.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Reports</b>.
Supplier shall provide Kraft with reports pertaining to the performance of the
Services and Supplier&#146;s other obligations under this Agreement sufficient to
permit Kraft to monitor and manage Supplier&#146;s performance (&#147;<b>Reports</b>&#148;). The Reports to be provided by Supplier shall
include those described in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 13</u></b>
in the format and at the frequencies provided therein, as well as those
provided by Kraft prior to the Commencement Date. In addition, from time to
time, Kraft may identify additional Reports to be generated by Supplier and
delivered to Kraft on an ad hoc or periodic basis. All Reports listed on <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 13 </u></b>shall be provided to
Kraft as part of the Services and at no additional charge to Kraft. If Supplier
can generate such additional reports using Supplier Personnel, Systems and
Software then-assigned to provide the Services without degradation of Services
or Service Levels, Supplier will do so at no additional charge. The Reports
described in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 13</u></b> and, to the extent
reasonably possible, all other Reports shall be provided to Kraft (i) by secure
on-line connection in an electronic format capable of being accessed by
Microsoft Office components and downloadable by Kraft, with the information
contained therein capable of being displayed graphically and accessible from a
web browser, and (ii) in traditional printed form.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.2.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Back-Up
Documentation</b>. As part of the Services, Supplier shall provide Kraft with such
documentation and other information available to Supplier as may be reasonably
requested by Kraft from time to time in order to verify the accuracy of the
Reports provided by Supplier. In addition, Supplier shall provide Kraft with
all documentation and other information reasonably requested by Kraft from time
to time to verify that Supplier&#146;s performance of the Services is in compliance
with the Service Levels and this Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.2.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Correction
of Errors</b>. As part of the Services, Supplier shall promptly correct any
errors or inaccuracies in or with respect to the Reports, the information or
data contained in such Reports, or other contract deliverables. Corrections
will be done at no additional charge where the error or inaccuracy was caused
by Supplier or its agents, or Subcontractor&#146;s failure to perform its
obligations in accordance with this Agreement, or by Managed Third Parties
subject to <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 6.6</u></b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Governance
Model; Meetings.</b><a name="a9_3GovernanceModelMeetings__133414"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.3.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Governance
Model</b>. The Parties shall manage their relationship under this Agreement
using the governance model in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 6</u></b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.3.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Meetings</b>.
During the Term, representatives of the Parties shall meet periodically or as
requested by Kraft to discuss matters arising under this Agreement, including
any such meetings provided for under the Transition Plan. Each Party shall bear
its own costs in connection with the </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">53</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='53',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">attendance
and participation of such Party&#146;s representatives in such meetings. Such
meetings shall include, at a minimum, the following:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3.2.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
periodic meeting at least monthly to review performance and monthly reports,
planned or anticipated activities and changes that might impact performance,
and such other matters as appropriate;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3.2.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
quarterly management meeting to review the monthly reports, review Supplier&#146;s
overall performance under the Agreement, review progress on the resolution of
issues, provide a strategic outlook for Kraft&#146;s and the Eligible Recipients&#146;
information systems requirements, and discuss such other matters as
appropriate;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3.2.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
meeting associated with the transition and ongoing provision of the Services,
quarterly during the first year of the Term and semi-annually thereafter;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3.2.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
quarterly meeting of senior management of both Parties to review relevant
contract and performance issues;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3.2.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a
periodic meeting of management of both Parties in which Supplier will (A)
explain how the Systems that Supplier operates in connection with the provision
of the Services work and are operated, (B) explain how the Services are
provided (in such detail as Kraft may request), and (C) provide such training
and documentation as Kraft may require for Kraft to understand and operate such
Systems and provide the Services after the termination or expiration of the
Agreement; and</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3.2.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>such
other meetings of Kraft and Supplier Personnel, including senior management of
Supplier, as Kraft may reasonably request.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.3.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Agenda
and Minutes</b>. For each such meeting, upon Kraft request, Supplier shall
prepare and distribute an agenda, which will incorporate the topics designated
by Kraft. Supplier shall distribute such agenda in advance of each meeting so
that the meeting participants may prepare for the meeting. In addition, upon
Kraft request, Supplier shall record and promptly distribute minutes for every
meeting for review and approval by Kraft.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.3.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Authorized
User and Eligible Recipient Meetings</b>. Supplier shall notify the Kraft
Contract Manager in advance of scheduled meetings with Authorized Users or
Eligible Recipients (other than meetings pertaining to the provision of
specific Services on a day-to-day basis) and shall invite the Kraft Contract
Manager to attend such meetings or to designate a representative to do so.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Quality
Assurance and Internal Controls</b>.<a name="a9_4QualityAssuranceAndInternalCo_133420"></a></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.4.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Supplier
shall develop and implement Quality Assurance and internal control processes
and procedures, including implementing tools and methodologies, to ensure that
the Services are performed in an accurate and timely manner, in accordance with
(i) the Service Levels and other requirements of this Agreement, generally
accepted practices of first-tier providers within the information technology
industry, (iii) the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to the extent of Supplier&#146;s
obligations set out in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2,</u></b>
or the requirements in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 17.4</u></b>
or otherwise provided in writing by Kraft, (iv) subject to <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section
15.10</u></b>, the Laws applicable to Kraft and the Eligible Recipients,
and (vi) industry practice standards applicable to Kraft and the Eligible
Recipients and the performance of the Services to the extent of Supplier&#146;s
obligations set out in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u></b>.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">54</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='54',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-09.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:21 2006' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

<div>
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;Such processes, procedures and controls shall
include verification, checkpoint reviews, testing, acceptance, and other
procedures for Kraft to assure the quality and timeliness of Supplier&#146;s
performance. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Supplier will:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Maintain
a strong control environment in day-to-day operations, to assure that the
following fundamental control objectives are met: (i) operational information
and financial information (to the extent required to be provided under this
Agreement, including for audit purposes) is valid, complete and accurate; (ii)
operations are performed efficiently and achieve effective results, consistent
with the requirements of this Agreement; and (iii) assets are safeguarded;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Build
the following basic control activities into work processes: (i) accountability
clearly defined and understood; (ii) access properly controlled; (iii) adequate
supervision; (iv) transactions properly authorized; (v) transactions properly
recorded; (vi) policies, procedures, and responsibilities documented; (vii)
adequate training and education; (viii) adequate separation of duties; and (ix)
recorded assets compared with existing assets;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Develop
and execute a process to ensure periodic control self-assessments are performed
with respect to all Services (such self-assessments to be performed at least
annually unless and until Kraft approves less frequent self-assessments);</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Maintain
an internal audit function to sufficiently monitor the processes and Systems
used to provide the Services (i.e., perform audits, track control measures,
communicate status to management, drive corrective action, etc.). As part of
such internal audit function, Supplier will:</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 144.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.4.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Provide
to Kraft, promptly after conducting any audit of Supplier&#146;s or its Affiliates&#146;
operations relating to the Services, a summary report that (i) describes the
scope of audit, (ii) identifies control weaknesses and any adverse impacts on
Kraft&#146;s operations, and (iii) sets forth a plan for remediation for any control
weaknesses or adverse impacts that have been identified.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Conduct
investigations of suspected fraudulent activities within Supplier&#146;s
organization that impact or could impact Kraft or the Eligible Recipients.
Supplier shall promptly notify Kraft of any such suspected fraudulent activity
and the results of any such investigation as they relate to Kraft or the
Eligible Recipients. At Supplier&#146;s request, Kraft shall provide reasonable
assistance to Supplier in connection with any such investigation;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Comply
with all applicable requirements and guidelines set forth in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 17.4</u></b>, or otherwise
provided in writing by Kraft in order to assist Kraft to meet the requirements
of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 and implementing regulations promulgated by
the United States Securities and Exchange Commission and the Public Company
Accounting Oversight Board, as well as similar Laws in other jurisdictions;</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Recommend
and, with Kraft&#146;s prior approval, implement compliance measures to satisfy
Sarbanes-Oxley requirements and similar requirements in other jurisdictions,
including as described in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u></b>
and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 17.4</u></b>; and</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">55</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='55',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-11.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:24 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 72.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4.1.8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Cause
the policies, processes and procedures used by
Supplier to interface with Kraft to provide the Services and the reports, user interfaces,
and deliverables or outputs of the Services that are&nbsp;made available to
Kraft<b><i style="font-weight:bold;"> </i></b>to be in conformance with the generally accepted practices of
the Information Technology Infrastructure Library (&#147;<b>ITIL</b>&#148;)
within 36 months after the Commencement Date, except as otherwise required in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u></b>
or as otherwise agreed upon by the Parties.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.4.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b>Supplier
shall submit such processes, procedures and controls for any changes made or
new functions introduced by Supplier to Kraft for its review, comment and
approval within 60 days after the Effective Date and shall use commercially
reasonable efforts to finalize such processes, procedures and controls and
obtain Kraft&#146;s final approval within 60 days after the Effective Date. Where
Supplier is required to document any processes, procedures and controls of
Kraft existing as of the Effective Date, Supplier shall provide that
documentation to Kraft for its review, comment and approval within 120 days
after the Effective Date. Upon Kraft&#146;s approval, such processes and procedures
shall be included in the Policy and Procedures Manual. Prior to the approval of
such processes and procedures by Kraft, Supplier shall adhere strictly to Kraft&#146;s
then current policies procedures, and controls. No failure or inability of the
quality assurance procedures to disclose any errors or problems with the
Services shall excuse Supplier&#146;s failure to comply with the Service Levels and
other terms of this Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><a name="ProcessesProceduresArchitecture"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Processes,
Procedures, Architecture, Standards and Planning</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.5.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Supplier
Support</b>. As requested by Kraft, Supplier shall assist Kraft on an on-going
basis in defining (A) information technology and other standards, policies,
practices, processes, procedures and controls to be adhered to and enforced by
Supplier in the performance of the Services; and (B) the associated IT
technologies architectures, standards, products and systems to be provided,
operated, managed, supported and/or used by Supplier in connection therewith
(collectively, the &#147;<b>Kraft Standards</b>&#148;).
As of the Effective Date, the Kraft Standards include the standards set forth
on <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 8</u></b>. Supplier also shall
assist Kraft on an annual basis or otherwise as requested by Kraft in preparing
Strategic Plans and short-term implementation plans. The assistance to be
provided by Supplier shall include: (i) active participation with Kraft
representatives on permanent and ad-hoc committees and working groups
addressing such issues; (ii) assessments of the then-current Kraft Standards at
a level of detail sufficient to permit Kraft to make informed business
decisions; (iii) analyses of the appropriate direction for such Kraft Standards
in light of business priorities, business strategies, competitive market
forces, and changes in technology; (iv) the provision of information to Kraft
regarding Supplier&#146;s technology, business processes and telecommunications
strategies for its own business that Supplier generally makes available to its
customers; and (v) recommendations regarding standards, processes, procedures
and controls and associated technology architectures, standards, products and
systems. With respect to each recommendation, Supplier shall provide the
following at a level of detail sufficient to permit Kraft to make an informed business
decision: (i) the projected cost to Kraft and the Eligible Recipients and
cost/benefit analyses; (ii) the changes, if any, in the personnel and other
resources Supplier, Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients will require to
operate and support the changed environment; (iii) the resulting impact on the
total costs of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients; (iv) the expected
performance, quality, responsiveness, efficiency, reliability, security risks
and other service levels; and (v) general plans and projected time schedules
for development and implementation. Any assistance provided by <b>&#160;*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
under this&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
or&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
(except as otherwise provided in&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>) shall be at no&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
beyond the&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
specified in&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>for
the Services, unless an&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> has been approved by&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">56</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='56',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-11.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:24 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.5.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Supplier
Familiarity with Kraft Standards</b>. Supplier is fully informed as to the
Kraft Standards as of the Commencement Date, including through due diligence
and its hiring of the Transitioned Employees, to the extent such Kraft
Standards have been made available to Supplier. Supplier shall be responsible
for including in the applicable Policy and Procedures Manual in accordance with
<b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.1</u></b> the Kraft Standards
delivered to Supplier in writing prior to the Effective Date and indicated as
such. Additions, deletions or modifications to the Kraft Standards shall be
communicated in writing by Kraft to Supplier.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.5.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Kraft
Authority and Supplier Compliance</b>. Kraft shall have final authority to
promulgate Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans and to modify or grant waivers
from such Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans. Supplier shall (i) comply with
and implement the Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans in providing the
Services, (ii) work with Kraft to enforce the Kraft Standards and Strategic
Plans, (iii) modify the Services as and to the extent necessary and to a
schedule to conform to such Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans, and (iv)
obtain Kraft&#146;s prior written approval for any deviations from such Kraft Standards
and Strategic Plans. Notwithstanding the requirements in this Agreement
regarding Supplier&#146;s compliance with the Kraft Standards, Kraft acknowledges
that Supplier&#146;s shared service Systems, which Supplier uses to provide services
to both Kraft and Supplier&#146;s other customers, will not be required to be in
compliance with the Kraft Standards, provided that such Systems must still meet
the requirements set forth in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Sections 13.2</u></b>
and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">15.11.1</u></b>, and must otherwise be
sufficient to enable Supplier to meet its other obligations under this
Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.5.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Financial,
Forecasting and Budgeting Support</b>. To support Kraft&#146;s forecasting and
budgeting processes, Supplier shall provide the following processes information
regarding the costs to be incurred by Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients in
connection with the Services and the cost/benefit to Kraft and/or the Eligible
Recipients associated therewith: (i) actual and forecasted utilization of
Resource Units; (ii) actual and forecasted changes in the total cost or resource
utilization of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients associated with changes to the
environment; (iii) opportunities to modify or improve the Services, to reduce
the Charges, Pass-Through Expenses or retained expenses incurred by Kraft; and
(iv) such other information as Kraft may reasonably request. Such information
shall be provided at Kraft&#146;s request and in accordance with the schedule
established by Kraft.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.5.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Technology
Plan</b>. Supplier shall develop and implement a technology and business
process plan that is consistent with the Kraft Standards and Strategic Plan and
that shows how Supplier will provide the Services to enable Kraft to achieve
the Strategic Plan objectives and to implement and support Kraft&#146;s business,
information technology objectives and strategies (&#147;<b>Technology
Plan</b>&#148;). The development of the Technology Plan will be an iterative
process that Supplier shall carry out in consultation with Kraft. The timetable
for finalization of the Technology Plan shall be set each year having regard to
the timetable for the Strategic Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.5.5.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Process</b>. The process for developing and approving the
Technology Plan shall be as follows. Supplier shall provide a draft Technology
Plan each year that includes multi-year implementation plans to achieve multi-year
objectives. Kraft shall review the draft Technology Plan and provide requested
amendments. Supplier shall incorporate any such amendments, unless it
reasonably believes that any requested amendment would not assist Kraft to
achieve its objectives and strategies. Kraft and Supplier shall escalate any
disagreements about requested amendments to the draft Technology Plan in
accordance with the dispute resolution procedure in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Article
19</u></b>. Following approval by Kraft, the draft Technology Plan will
replace the previous plan. Approval of the</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">57</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='57',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-11.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:24 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Technology
Plan by Kraft shall not relieve Supplier of any obligation under this Agreement
in relation to its provision of the Services.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.5.5.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Contents</b>. In the Technology Plan, Supplier shall, among
other things, include plans for: (A) refreshing Equipment and Software
(consistent with the refresh cycles defined in defined in this Agreement or its
Schedules); (B) adopting new technologies and business processes as part of the
Technology Evolution of the Services, as defined in this Agreement; and (C)
maintaining flexibility as described in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.17</u></b>.
In the Technology Plan, Supplier shall also present a reasonably detailed
implementation plan for the upcoming year, and a<b><i style="font-weight:bold;"> </i></b>high
level implementation plan for subsequent years, in each case for the
achievement of the Strategic Plan and the Kraft Standards.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.5.5.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Compliance</b>. Supplier shall comply with the Technology Plan
at all times, unless Kraft agrees to depart from the Technology Plan. Any such
agreement to depart from the Technology Plan from the date on which it is
signed by Kraft will not relieve Supplier of its responsibilities under the
previous plan prior to the date of such agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><a name="ChangeControl"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Change
Control</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Compliance
with Change Control Procedures</b>. In making any change in the information
technology or other standards, processes, procedures and controls or associated
IT technologies, architectures, standards, products, Software, Equipment,
Systems, Services or Materials provided, operated, managed, supported or used
in connection with the Services, Supplier shall comply with the change control
procedures specified in the Policy and Procedures Manual (&#147;<b>Change
Control Procedures</b>&#148;). The Policy and Procedures Manual shall contain
a procedure that allows Kraft to exercise the approval rights in this Section
and complies with the following requirements:</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.6.1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Impact Assessment</b>. If Supplier desires to make any change,
upgrade, replacement or addition that may have an adverse impact or require
changes as described in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.6.3</u></b>
or increase the risk of Supplier not being able to provide the Services in
accordance with this Agreement or violate or be inconsistent with Kraft
Standards or Strategic Plans, then Supplier shall prepare a written risk
assessment and mitigation plan: (i) describing in detail the nature and extent
of such adverse impact or risk; (ii) describing any benefits, savings or risks
to Kraft or the Eligible Recipients associated with such change; and (iii)
proposing strategies to mitigate any adverse risks or impacts associated with
such change and, after consultation and agreement with Kraft, implement the
plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.6.1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Comparison Testing</b>. Each time that Supplier makes a material
change (more than, for instance, routine maintenance or like for like changes
in the environment) to the Software, Equipment, Systems, Services or Materials
Supplier shall perform a comparison test at a reasonable and mutually agreed
level of detail to ensure the change will not have an adverse impact on the
costs, business, or environment of Kraft or an Eligible Recipient or on the
functionality interoperability, performance, accuracy, speed, legality,
responsiveness, quality or resource efficiency of, the Services. In addition,
at Kraft&#146;s request, Supplier shall perform a comparison at a reasonable and
mutually agreed level of detail, between the amount of Resource Units required
to perform a representative sample of the Services being performed for Kraft
and the Eligible Recipients </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">58</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='58',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-11.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:24 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">immediately
prior to the change and immediately after the change. Kraft shall not be
required to pay for increased Resource Unit usage due to a change except to the
extent that such change is requested or approved by Kraft after notice from
Supplier of such increased Resource Unit usage.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.6.1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Prior
to making any change or using any new (e.g., not tested in or for the Kraft
environment) Software, Equipment or System to provide the Services, Supplier
shall have verified by appropriate testing that the change or item has been
properly installed, is operating in accordance with its specifications, is
performing its intended functions in a reliable manner and is compatible with
and capable of operating as part of the Kraft environment. This obligation
shall be in addition to any unit testing done by Supplier as part of routine
deployment or installation of Software or Equipment.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Financial
Responsibility for Changes</b>. Unless otherwise set forth in this Agreement,
including specified in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u>, <u>4.2</u>,
<u>11</u>  <u>or</u>  <u>12</u></b>, or approved in accordance with <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.6.3</u></b> or otherwise,
Supplier shall bear all charges, fees and costs associated with any change
desired by Supplier, including all charges, fees and costs associated with (i)
the design, installation, implementation, testing and rollout of such change,
(ii) any modification or enhancement to, or substitution for, any impacted
business process or associated Software, Equipment, System, Services or
Materials, (iii) any increase in the cost to Kraft or the Eligible Recipients
of operating, maintaining or supporting any impacted business process or
associated Software, Equipment, System, Services or Materials, and (iv) subject
to <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.6.8</u></b>, any increase in
Resource Unit usage resulting from such change.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Kraft
Approval &#150; Cost, Adverse Impact</b>. Supplier shall make no change which will
(i) increase Kraft&#146;s total cost of receiving the Services; (ii) require
material changes to, or have an adverse impact on, Kraft&#146;s or an Eligible
Recipient&#146;s business, operations, facilities, business processes, systems,
software, utilities, tools or equipment (including those provided, managed,
operated, supported and/or used on their behalf by Kraft Third Party
Contractors); (iii) require Kraft or the Eligible Recipients, at their expense,
to install a new version, release, upgrade of, or replacement for, any Software
or Equipment or to modify any Software or Equipment; (iv) have a material
adverse impact on the functionality, interoperability, performance, accuracy,
speed, responsiveness, quality or resource efficiency of the Services; (v) have
an adverse impact on any Applications run by Kraft or the Eligible Recipients;
(vi) have an adverse impact on Supplier&#146;s ability to adequately deliver the
Services; (vii) have an adverse impact on the cost, either actual or planned,
to Kraft of terminating all or any part of the Services or exercising its right
to in-source or use third parties; (viii) have an adverse impact on Kraft&#146;s or
an Eligible Recipient&#146;s environment (including its flexibility to deal with
future changes, interoperability and its stability); (ix) introduce new
technology to Kraft&#146;s or an Eligible Recipient&#146;s environment or business, to
the extent that such introduction has or may have an impact on Kraft&#146;s or an
Eligible Recipient&#146;s environment; (x) have an adverse impact on the
functionality, interoperability, performance, accuracy, speed, responsiveness,
quality, cost or resource efficiency of Kraft&#146;s Retained Systems and Business
Processes; or (xi) violate or be inconsistent with Kraft Standards or Strategic
Plans as specified in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.5</u></b>,
without first obtaining Kraft&#146;s approval, which approval Kraft may withhold in
its sole discretion. If Supplier desires to make such a change, it shall
provide to Kraft a written proposal describing in detail the extent to which
the desired change may affect the functionality, performance, price or resource
efficiency of the Services and any benefits, savings or risks to Kraft or the
Eligible Recipients associated with such change.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Information
for Exercise of Strategic Authority</b>. In order to facilitate Kraft&#146;s
strategic control pursuant to <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.5</u></b>,
Supplier will provide Kraft with such information as Kraft shall</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">59</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='59',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-11.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:24 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">reasonably
require prior to making any proposed change. Such information shall include, at
a minimum, a description of the proposed rights of Kraft and the Eligible
Recipients with respect to ownership and licensing (including any related
restrictions) relating to such Software, Equipment or other technology or
Materials. Such description shall include the license fees, maintenance fees
and/or purchase or lease terms (if any) for use of such Software, Equipment or
other technology or Materials by Kraft, the Eligible Recipients and their
respective third party contractors upon termination or expiration of the Term
and any limitations or conditions on such use.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Temporary
Emergency Changes</b>. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Supplier may make
temporary changes required by an emergency if it has been unable to contact the
Kraft Contract Manager or his or her designee to obtain approval after making
reasonable efforts. Supplier shall document and report such emergency changes
to Kraft not later than the next business day after the change is made. Such
changes shall not be implemented on a permanent basis unless and until approved
by Kraft.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Implementation
of Changes</b>. Supplier will schedule and implement all changes so as not to
(i) disrupt or adversely impact the business or operations of Kraft or the
Eligible Recipients, (ii) degrade the Services then being received by them, or
(iii) interfere with their ability to obtain the full benefit of the Services.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Planning
and Tracking</b>. On a monthly basis, Supplier will prepare a rolling quarterly
&#147;look ahead&#148; schedule for ongoing and planned changes for the next three
months. The status of changes will be monitored and tracked by Supplier against
the applicable schedule.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.6.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Comparisons</b>.
For any change, Supplier shall, upon Kraft&#146;s request, perform a comparison at a
reasonable and mutually agreed level of detail, between the amount of Resource
Units required to perform a representative sample of the Services being
performed for Kraft and the Eligible Recipients immediately prior to the change
and immediately after the change. Kraft shall not be required to pay for
increased Resource Unit usage due to a change except to the extent that such
change is requested or approved by Kraft after notice from Supplier of such
increased Resource Unit usage.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><a name="SoftwareCurrency"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Software
Currency</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.7.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Currency
of Software</b>. Subject to and in accordance with <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Sections
6.4</u></b>, <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">9.5</u></b>, <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">9.6</u></b>, <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">9.7.3</u></b>
and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 4</u></b>, Supplier will maintain
reasonable currency, in compliance at least with the currency requirements set
forth in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u></b> (including the
subsidiary schedules to <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u></b>)
and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 4.2</u></b>, for Software for
which it is financially responsible under this Agreement and to provide
maintenance and support for new releases and versions of Software for which it
is operationally responsible. At Kraft&#146;s direction, Supplier shall operate
multiple releases or versions of Software, without any increase in the Monthly
Base Charges, consistent with Supplier&#146;s obligations under <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule
2.2</u></b>. Supplier shall use commercially reasonable efforts to
support Software that is beyond the support requirements of <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2.2. </u></b>In addition, unless
otherwise directed by Kraft, Supplier shall keep Software within release levels
supported by the appropriate third party vendor to ensure compatibility with
other Software or Equipment components of the Systems and of Kraft&#146;s Retained
Systems and Business Processes. For purposes of this Section, &#147;<b>reasonable currency</b>&#148; shall mean that, unless otherwise
directed by Kraft, (i) Supplier shall maintain Software within one Major
Release of the then current Major Release, unless otherwise specified in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 2</u></b> and <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule
4.2</u></b>, and (ii) Supplier shall install Minor Releases promptly or
earlier, if requested by Kraft.</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">60</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='60',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-11.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:24 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.7.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Evaluation
and Testing</b>. Prior to installing a new Major Release or Minor Release,
Supplier shall evaluate and test such Release to verify that it will perform in
accordance with this Agreement and the Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans and
that it will not (i) increase Kraft&#146;s total cost of receiving the Services;
(ii) require material changes to Kraft&#146;s or the Eligible Recipient&#146;s business,
facilities, systems, software or equipment; (iii) adversely impact the
functionality, interoperability, performance, accuracy, speed, responsiveness,
quality or resource efficiency of the Services; or (iv) violate or be inconsistent
with Kraft Standards or Strategic Plans or applicable Laws. The evaluation and
testing performed by Supplier shall be at least consistent with the reasonable
and accepted industry norms applicable to the performance of such Services and
shall be at least as rigorous and comprehensive as the evaluation and testing
usually performed by highly qualified service providers under such
circumstances.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.7.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Approval
by Kraft</b>. Notwithstanding <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 9.7.1</u></b>,
Supplier shall confer with Kraft prior to installing any Major Release or Minor
Release, shall provide Kraft with the results of its testing and evaluation of
such Release and a detailed implementation plan and shall not install such
Release if directed not to do so by Kraft; provided that Supplier will be
provided relief from meeting any affected Service Levels due to Kraft&#146;s
decision not to install such Release, but only if (i) Supplier notifies Kraft
that not installing the Release will impact Supplier&#146;s ability to meet a
Service Level; (ii) Supplier identifies and considers all reasonable
alternatives available to address and avoid the impending performance failure;
and (iii) Supplier uses commercially reasonable efforts to meet such Service
Levels notwithstanding Kraft&#146;s rejection of the Release. Where specified by
Kraft, Supplier shall not install new Software releases or make other Software
changes until Kraft has completed and provided formal signoff on successful
user acceptance testing. Supplier shall not install new Software releases or
make other Software changes if doing so would require Kraft or the Eligible
Recipients to install new releases of, replace, or make other changes to
Applications Software or other Software for which Kraft is financially
responsible unless Kraft consents to such change. Supplier shall install,
operate and support multiple versions of the same Software as and to the extent
directed to do so by Kraft.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.7.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Updates
by Kraft</b>. Kraft and the Eligible Recipients shall have the right, but not
the obligation, to install new releases of, replace, or make other changes to
Applications Software or other Software for which Kraft is financially
responsible under this Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><a name="NetworkConfigurationData"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Network
Configuration Data</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Supplier (i) shall provide Kraft (and its third party
vendors) with network configuration data to the extent relevant to Kraft&#146;s and
the Eligible Recipients use of the network supported by Supplier; and (ii)
hereby grants to Kraft (and its third party vendors) the unlimited right to use
such data in connection with businesses of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><a name="AccesstoSpecialized"></a><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.9</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Access
to Specialized Supplier Skills and Resources; Disagreements Regarding New
Services.</b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9.9.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Specialized
Services. </b>Upon Kraft&#146;s request, Supplier shall provide Kraft and the
Eligible Recipients with prompt access to Supplier&#146;s specialized services,
personnel and resources pertaining to information technology standards,
processes and procedures and associated software, equipment and systems on an
expedited basis taking into account the relevant circumstances (the &#147;<b>Specialized Services</b>&#148;). The Parties acknowledge that the
provision of such Specialized Services may, in some cases, constitute New
Services for which Supplier is entitled to additional compensation, but in no
event shall Supplier be entitled to any additional compensation for New
Services under this subsection unless the Kraft Contract Manager and Supplier
Account Executive, or their authorized designee, expressly agree upon such
additional </p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">61</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">
