 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 109.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">shall
reimburse&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
for any net costs or expenses incurred to realize such&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; * </b>if
and to the extent&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
(i) notifies&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of such additional costs and obtains&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> approval prior to incurring such
costs, (ii) uses commercially reasonable efforts to identify and consider
practical alternatives, and reasonably determines that there is no other more
practical or cost effective way to obtain&#160;
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>without incurring such expenses,
and (iii) uses commercially reasonable efforts to minimize the additional costs
to be&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 108.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.6.2.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>An
Extraordinary Event shall not result in&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> to&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
being&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
than such Charges would have been if the RRCs, ARCs and other rates and charges
then specified in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 4</u></b>
had been applied. <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
may, at its sole option, elect, for each Extraordinary Event, at any time to
forego its rights under this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11.6</u></b>
and instead, apply RRCs, ARCs and other rates and charges specified in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 4</u></b> to adjust the Charges.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Unanticipated
Change</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If an Unanticipated Change occurs, and if Kraft
requests that the Services be modified to incorporate such Unanticipated Change
after the completion of Transformation for those Services to be transformed, or
after Transition for all other Services, the Parties shall use the procedures
in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11.6.2</u></b> to equitably adjust
the Charges and other relevant provisions of this Agreement to take such
Unanticipated Change into Account. An &#147;<b>Unanticipated Change</b>&#148;
shall consist of a material change in the technologies and/or business
processes available to provide all or part of the Services which is outside the
normal evolution of technology experienced by the information technology and
other in-scope services, that was not generally available as of the Effective
Date, and that would materially reduce Supplier&#146;s cost of providing the
Services.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Proration</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Periodic charges under this Agreement are to be
computed on a calendar month basis, and shall be prorated for any partial month
on a calendar day basis.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.9</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Refundable
Items</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.9.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Prepaid
Amounts</b>. Where Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients have prepaid for a
service or function for which Supplier is assuming financial responsibility
under this Agreement, Supplier shall promptly refund to Kraft or such Eligible
Recipient, upon either Party identifying the prepayment, that portion of such
prepaid expense that is attributable to periods on and after the Commencement
Date; provided, however, that if Supplier had not received notice of the
prepayment prior to the Effective Date, Supplier shall only be obligated to
refund amounts to Kraft to the extent Supplier received an economic benefit
from the prepayment (e.g., if Supplier can demonstrate that it had planned to
use a replacement service at a lower cost, Supplier would only be obligated to
refund such lower cost amount).</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.9.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Refunds
and Credits</b>. If Supplier should receive a refund, credit, discount or other
rebate for goods or services paid for by Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients
on a Pass-Through Expense, Retained Expense, cost-plus or cost-reimbursement
basis, then Supplier shall (i) notify Kraft of such refund, credit, discount or
rebate and (ii) pay the full amount of such refund, credit, discount or rebate
to Kraft or such Eligible Recipient.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.9.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Allocation
of Balloon, Roll-Over and Similar Payments</b>. With respect to contracts
assigned to Kraft in connection with any Termination Assistance Services, where
the costs under any such</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">86</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='86',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-15.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:30 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">contracts
entered into by Supplier, a Supplier Affiliate or Subcontractor are to be
apportioned between the Parties, Supplier shall be responsible for the payment
of any costs required to be paid by Kraft after the assignment of such
contracts to Kraft, to the extent such costs are attributable to periods during
the Term and the provision of any Termination Assistance Services.
Additionally,&#160; if lease, license,
maintenance, service charges or other periodic payments under any such contract
increase after assignment to Kraft (other than to account for cost of living or
similar increases) (e.g., balloon or similar payments), unless Kraft has
expressly agreed to assume such increase, all such payments shall be recalculated
so that, as between the Parties, the entire cost shall be amortized evenly over
the entire term of such contract. In the case of licenses, such allocation of
costs shall not apply to the initial one-time license fees paid or payable by
Supplier. Supplier shall be responsible for those back-end and recalculated
costs that are attributable to periods during the Term and the provision of any
Termination Assistance Services, and, upon assignment to Kraft, Kraft shall be
responsible for all other payments. Supplier shall provide a credit to Kraft
for any such back-end costs and recalculated costs against any amounts then due
and owing by Kraft or, if there are no amounts then owed by Kraft, pay such
back-end or recalculated amounts to Kraft within 30 days after the assignment
of the applicable contract to Kraft.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.10</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Kraft
Benchmarking Reviews</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.10.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Benchmarking
Review</b>. Commencing 24 months after the Commencement Date, and no more
frequently than once every 12 months thereafter for each scope of Services that
is benchmarked, Kraft may, subject to this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11.10</u></b>,
request that a benchmarking study be performed by an independent third party
with the characteristics noted in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11.10.2</u></b>
(a &#147;<b>Benchmarker</b>&#148;) to compare the quality
and price of all or any portion of the Services against the quality and price
of other well-managed suppliers performing similar services to ensure that
Kraft is receiving from Supplier pricing and levels of service that are
competitive with market rates, prices and service levels, given the nature,
volume and type of Services provided by Supplier hereunder (&#147;<b>Benchmarking</b>&#148;). The Benchmarker may be hired and Kraft may
provide the Benchmarker with instructions and information prior to the 25<font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font>&#160;month after the Commencement Date, but the
actual benchmarking study may not commence earlier than 24 months after the
Commencement Date. In addition, Kraft shall not require Benchmarking more than
3 times in any Contract Year. In making this comparison, the Benchmarker shall
consider such factors as the Benchmarker typically considers in its
benchmarking methodology, including the following factors, and adjust the
prices as and to the extent appropriate:&#160;
(i) any financial engineering, such as whether supplier transition
charges are paid by the customer as incurred or amortized over the term of this
Agreement; (ii) the extent to which supplier pricing includes the purchase of
the customer&#146;s existing assets; (iii) the extent to which supplier pricing
includes the cost of acquiring future assets; (iv) the extent to which this
Agreement calls for Supplier to provide and comply with unique Kraft
requirements; (v) whether Service Taxes are included in such pricing or stated
separately in supplier invoices; (vi) nature, size, scope and term of the contract,
and (vii) service locations.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.10.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>General</b>.
Any Benchmarker engaged to perform the benchmarking study shall execute a
non-disclosure agreement substantially in the form attached hereto as <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 3</u></b>, and must be an
independent, established and industry recognized third party with demonstrated
benchmarking expertise, methodology and data sources, must not be a provider of
the Services, Direct Kraft Competitor or a Direct Supplier Competitor or
affiliated or associated with either Party in such a manner that an objective
person would regard the Benchmarker as likely to have a material conflict of
interest, such as because of its status as a consultant or auditor of either
Party, and therefore be unable to conduct the benchmark study objectively and independently.
Notwithstanding the foregoing, Supplier hereby irrevocably consents to Kraft&#146;s
use of any</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">87</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='87',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-15.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:30 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Benchmarker
listed in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 25</u></b> at any time during
the Term. The Benchmarker shall be engaged on terms consistent with this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11.10</u></b> and otherwise
acceptable to Kraft, provided that Supplier shall have an opportunity to review
and comment on the proposed agreement, and may at its option elect to be a
party to such agreement and share equally with Kraft in the amounts payable to
such Benchmarker. Supplier and Kraft shall cooperate fully with the Benchmarker
and shall provide reasonable access to any premises, equipment, personnel or
documents and provide any assistance required by the Benchmarker to conduct the
Benchmarking, all at Kraft&#146;s and Supplier&#146;s respective cost and expense. The
Benchmarking shall be conducted so as not to unreasonably disrupt Supplier&#146;s
operations under this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.10.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Result
of Benchmarking</b>. If the Benchmarker finds that the Charges paid by Kraft
for all Services or for any service element are greater than&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of the prices charged by other well-managed suppliers for work of a similar
nature, type or volume (the &#147;<b>Benchmark Standard</b>&#148;),
the Charges shall be&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> provided that Supplier shall not
be obligated to implement Benchmarking&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> to the extent such&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
would result in Supplier&#146;s total Charges&#160;
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> as compared to its pricing
absent such&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>.
Such&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
shall become effective immediately upon receipt of the Benchmarker&#146;s report,
though <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> reserves&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
the Benchmarker&#146;s report pursuant to the dispute resolution proceedings
described in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11.10.4</u></b>. Any reversal
of the Benchmarking findings will be effective prospectively only from the date
the dispute is resolved.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.10.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Supplier
Review and Dispute</b>. Kraft shall provide Supplier with a copy of the
Benchmarker&#146;s report and Supplier shall have 10 days to review such report and
contest the Benchmarker&#146;s findings. If the Parties are unable to agree upon the
validity of such findings, the matter shall be resolved pursuant to the dispute
resolution procedures set forth in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Article 19</u></b>.
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> in Supplier&#146;s Charges shall be
implemented effective as of the date the Benchmarker&#146;s final report was&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
to&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">11.11</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>*&#160; *&#160; * Customer</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Supplier&#146;s Charges to Kraft for Services to be
provided under this Agreement shall be&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>Supplier&#146;s&#160;&#160;&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
under other contracts entered into by Supplier after the Effective Date with
companies in the consumer packaged goods industry for comparable services
(taking into consideration&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> for capital, financial
structuring, other financial terms and conditions, geography and service
levels) and having a contract value in excess of&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>.
If Supplier offers&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
under any such contract, Supplier shall&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> effective as of the&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
were first&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>.
At the end of each Contract Year,&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> will provide&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> a letter from a&#160;
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> senior executive either
confirming that in the aggregate that Kraft&#146;s <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
are&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
to any such other customers or Supplier will&#160;
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> accordingly at the beginning of
the next Contract Year. In no event will (i)&#160;
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> be required to disclose to&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
or any agent or auditor for Kraft any confidential information of any&#160; <b>* &#160;*&#160; *</b>,
(ii)&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
be required to breach any confidentiality agreement it has with&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>,
and (iii)&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
be entitled to audit&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> books and records for purposes
of verifying&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
compliance with this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11.11</u></b>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; INVOICING AND PAYMENT</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Invoicing</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.1.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Invoice</b>.
Within fifteen days after the beginning of each month, Supplier will present
Kraft with an invoice for any Charges due and owing for the preceding month
(the &#147;<b>Monthly Invoice</b>&#148;), including Monthly
Base Charges, Charges for Transition Services and Transformation Services, and
ARCs and RRCs. The invoice shall be delivered in hard copy and/or
electronically to such</p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">88</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='88',FILE='C:\JMS\danandhan\06-15579-1\task1280816\15579-1-ja-15.htm',USER='danandhan',CD='Aug  6 13:30 2006' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
 <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"></p>


<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">billing
address(es) as Kraft may direct. Supplier shall not invoice Kraft for any
advance or concurrent charges or other amounts.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.1.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Form
and Data</b>. At Kraft&#146;s request, Supplier shall provide separate Monthly
Invoices for each country to which Supplier is then providing Services. With
respect to the Resource Units in the Application Servers Tower that reside in
Supplier Facilities or, if prior to the completion of Transition and
Transformation, in the Kraft Facilities, Kraft may allocate the Charges for
those Resource Units to Eligible Recipients in the countries that are receiving
the benefit of the Services reflected by those Resource Units based on an
allocation formula Kraft provides to Supplier. Supplier will calculate the
Charges based on the location of the Resource Units and internally allocate
those Charges from that location to the Eligible Recipients in a country or
countries designated by Kraft and invoice Eligible Recipient in country for
those Charges. &nbsp;Unless otherwise agreed by the Parties, invoicing for
Kraft&#146;s existing in-scope entities shall be done in accordance with <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Schedule 4.8</u></b>. If Kraft adds
business that consumes Services in a country and Supplier is not then issuing
invoices to an Eligible Recipient in that country, Kraft can require Supplier
to begin issuing invoices to that country. Supplier shall issue such invoice
either from a Supplier Affiliate located in the same country, or, if Supplier
does not have an Affiliate in that country, from another country as mutually
agreed by Kraft and Supplier. Each invoice shall be in the form specified in <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 4</u></b> and shall (i) comply with
all applicable legal, regulatory and accounting requirements; and (ii) allow
Kraft to validate volumes and fees. Each invoice shall include the pricing
calculations and related data utilized to establish the Charges and sufficient
information to validate the service volumes and associated Charges. The data
underlying each invoice shall be delivered to Kraft electronically (if
requested by Kraft) in a form and format compatible with Kraft&#146;s accounting
systems. In addition, Supplier shall provide Kraft with a database of current
and detailed information regarding its Charges, with the information in a
format approved by Kraft, that can be used by Kraft to produce chargebacks by
Kraft business unit.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.1.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Credits</b>.
To the extent a credit may be due to Kraft pursuant to this Agreement, Supplier
shall provide Kraft with an appropriate credit against amounts then due and
owing; if no further payments are due to Supplier, Supplier shall pay such
amounts to Kraft within 15 days.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.1.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>.
If&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
fails to provide an&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
to&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
for (i) the&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
within&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
after the&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
for which those&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>,
(ii) any other&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
(excluding any&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
and&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>)
within&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
after the&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
in which the Services subject to&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> are rendered (or a total of&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
so long as&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
has notified&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
within such&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of the delay and the estimated amount of the&#160;
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>), or (iii)&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
within&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
after the&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
in which the applicable&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> or&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of the&#160; &#160;<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
is received by&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
, then&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
shall waive any right it may otherwise have to&#160;
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> for and&#160;&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
such amount (and, with respect to&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> and&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
shall be required to&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> such&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
and&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
and any associated&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
or&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
without&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>).
<b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> shall notify&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of any delays of any&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b> extending more than&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
of which&#160; <b>*&#160; *&#160; *</b>
is aware.</p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:-36.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Payment
Due</b>.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to the other provisions of this <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Article 12</u></b> and except as otherwise
provided in <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">&#160;</i><u>Schedule
4.8</u></b> for the countries specified therein, each Monthly Invoice provided
for under <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 12.1</u></b> shall be due and
payable by Kraft by wire transfer in immediately available funds within 30 days
after receipt by Kraft of such Monthly Invoice unless the amount in question is
disputed in accordance with <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 12.4</u></b>.
Any amount due under this Agreement for which a time for payment is not
otherwise specified also shall be due and payable within 30 days, subject to
Kraft&#146;s right to withhold pursuant to <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Section 12.4</u></b>.
Any undisputed amounts not paid when due will thereafter bear interest until
paid at the Interest Rate.</font></p>


 <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font face="Times New Roman">89</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">
